details.article: 食品表示基準 (Food Labeling Standards) 別表第1
details.reason: This is designated as a 'Specified Raw Material' (特定原材料) for which allergen labeling is mandatory due to high incidence and severity of allergic reactions.
details.note: Japan's allergen labeling system categorizes items into 'Specified Raw Materials' (mandatory, 8 items as of 2023) and 'Raw Materials Equivalent to Specified Ones' (recommended, 20 items as of 2023). The list may be periodically updated.

details.article: 食品表示基準 (Food Labeling Standards) 別表第1
details.reason: くるみ (Walnut) is designated as a 'Specified Raw Material' (特定原材料) for which allergen labeling is mandatory due to its high incidence and severity of allergic reactions. Added as mandatory in 2023.
details.note: Japan's allergen labeling system categorizes items into 'Specified Raw Materials' (mandatory, 8 items as of 2023) and 'Raw Materials Equivalent to Specified Ones' (recommended, 20 items as of 2023). The list may be periodically updated.
